entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets mixed with freezing rain early this morning and ending this morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
